tool.name: PrimerPlate
tool.description: convert primer files into the primer plate for worklist generation.
tool.help:
Convert primer files into the primer plate for worklist generation.
- Inputs: - Primer files: *csv* file(s) with the list(s) of primers. - Plate files: *csv* or *xlsx* file(s) with plate information. **Feature not implemented**
- Outputs: - *csv* file with the merged list of primers.
